overview: Ron Ho, President and CEO, has more than 23 years of executive management experience in the medical device industry with an emphasis in product development and operations. His successful track record in the ultrasound business includes tenure with Siemens Medical Solutions in engineering and general management positions. Most recently, Mr. Ho was the President and CEO at Metron Systems located in Snoqualmie, Washington. Mr. Ho has several ultrasound-related patents and has earned both his Bachelor’s Degree and Master’s Degree from the University of Washington.
